s: March 25, 2025 - Each day will include daily teachings ... and Kelly Minter and reflection time on the boat. You will also be ministering in villages along the Amazon River. There will also be opportunities to debrief with the team about experiences and participate in excursions to see all the wildlife and beauty the Amazon has to offer.
